home.name: Dmitry Kolotusha
home.info: I write functional, complex, beautiful websites (Single Page Application). I strive for professional knowledge in React and Vue.

text.h3: My name is Dmitry Kolotusha and I am a
text.p: I strive to write my code cleanly, so that it would be understandable to others. I want to try myself in team development on Vue, React. I am attentive to the tasks set. A great desire to learn more technologies in web development and create truly unique, complex and beautiful projects.

react.title: React marathon
